title: Riot, will the eclipse skins for leona and diana ever be real
body:
Or were they just a rumor

it was lunar eclipse leona
and solar eclipse diana

replies.body: yeah but what would they look like? sounds really boring to me

> [{quoted}](name=Wumachine,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=5AZYklld,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-30T10:47:17.234+0000)
>
> yeah but what would they look like? sounds really boring to me

Well there were skin concept fully designed, but this was back in S3 i heard about it so i have no link for you, but it was basically they were the opposite of their normal (diana - solar eclipse, and leo - lunar eclipse)
